title: About Me

content:
Since the first time I watched Zootopia at the age of 15, my interest in animation has been profound. The exceptional work of Pixar has deeply impressed me. In early 2024, I finally began using Blender as my primary modeling application and started creating my own projects with it. I studied several tutorials and have become proficient in using this software based on my own insights.
I owe a special thanks to KurTips, one of the best online tutors I’ve ever had.
Little Foxes in the Forest This is my debut piece. Through hands-on learning and a commitment to perfectionism, it took me approximately 8 days, working over 10 hours each day, to complete the entire artwork.
Your browser does not support the video tag. Ink Dragon This is my second piece. The scene in this artwork is significantly larger compared to my previous work. I utilized 3D models to create 2D animation, achieving beautiful results in the end. The style draws inspiration from traditional Chinese ink paintings known as Guohua.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
